channel.title: png on Poney Island
channel.description: Recent content in png on Poney Island

item.title: picoCTF 2021 - Forensics
item.description: information 1 exiftool cat.jpg | grep License | awk '{print $3}' | base64 -d Matryoshka doll The downloaded file is NOT a jpg, it is a PNG: file dolls.jpg dolls.jpg: PNG image data, 594 x 1104, 8-bit/color RGBA, non-interlaced Zsteg has found a hidden ZIP file, at the end of the image: zsteg dolls.jpg [?] 379138 bytes of extra data after image end (IEND), offset = 0x4286c extradata:0 .. file: Zip archive data, at least v2.
